topic.title: The ultimate demise of ExHentai/SadPanda...
topic.body:
I recently read that if nothing changes it will shutdown by the end of 2020, maybe it's just hype but I'm not sure what to think. Any ideas... I'm thinking moving it to ZeroNet if possible.

https://tinyurl.com/y4pdalwg

1565542990_1CmgfFAZ5VHekkpKkKAfTX3EcjQjs.body:
> [223556](#comment_68_1LdgxNSynzpd5Vyi3Ej12adEuWbo1nWFu9): Why should I care about some hentai site?

Isn't that why we are here... government changing laws to take sites offline. ZeroNet trying to protect the internet.
